mapper.select: update date_of_qty set qty = #{qty} where id = #{id}

update date_of_qty as A inner join (select ifnull(real_qty,0) as real_qty, d.id as id from date_of_qty d left join (select sum(qty) as real_qty, visit_date from dinner_reservation group by visit_date) v on now_date = v.visit_date where d.id = #{id}) as B on A.id = B.id set A.qty = B.real_qty

select id, now_date,id, SUBSTR( _UTF8'일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(now_date), 1) as dayOfTheWeek, ifnull(real_qty,0) as real_qty , qty, ifnull(qty-real_qty,qty) as last_qty from date_of_qty d left join (select sum(qty) as real_qty, visit_date from dinner_reservation group by visit_date) v on now_date = v.visit_date where date(now_date) between DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) and DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);
select id, now_date, qty from date_of_qty where id = #{id};
update dinner_reservation set is_checked=1, checked_date=#{checked_date} where id = #{id}
select id,loginId, part_name, employee_name, phone_number, visit_date, contents, qty, password, write_date, revised_write_date, is_checked, checked_date from dinner_reservation where id = #{id}
select id from dinner_reservation where is_checked=false and employee_name = #{employee_name} and visit_date like STR_TO_DATE(now(), '%Y-%m-%d');
select id,loginId,employee_name, qty, part_name, visit_date,write_date,is_checked,contents from dinner_reservation where date(visit_date) between date(now()) and DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 10 DAY)

update dinner_reservation as A set A.ate = 1 where A.id = ((select id from (select id from dinner_reservation where id=#{id} and is_checked=false and visit_date like STR_TO_DATE(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) B))

select d1.id,d2.part_name,d2.loginId, d1.dinner_reservation_id, d2.id, if(d2.qty-1 < 1,d2.employee_name,concat(concat(d2.employee_name,' 외 '),concat(d2.qty-1,'명'))) as employee_name,d2.qty, if(CHAR_LENGTH(d2.contents) <= 8,d2.contents,concat(left(d2.contents,5),'..')) as contents ,d2.visit_date,d2.write_date,d2.is_checked from dinner_info d1 inner join dinner_reservation d2 on d1.id = d2.id
and d2.employee_name like concat('%',#{employee_name},'%')
and date(d2.visit_date) >= date(#{visit_date1})
and date(d2.visit_date) <= date(#{visit_date2})
order by d2.visit_date asc , d2.write_date asc;
